english: beginning to distinguish between shapes that lie flat and solid forms that stand up on their own
irish: tús a chur le hidirdhealú a dhéanamh idir cruthanna a luíonn go cothrom agus foirmeacha soladacha a sheasann gan tacaíocht

english: fat, twisty, squat, bumpy
irish: ramhar, lúbach, stóinsithe, cnapach

english: making a variety of forms in clay
irish: foirmeacha éagsúla a dhéanamh i gcré

english: squeezing, pinching, pulling, squashing, prodding a small ball of clay
irish: liathróid bheag chré a fháisceadh, a tharraingt, a bhrú, a phriocadh agus a rolladh

english: tearing pieces from the clay and putting them together again
irish: píosaí a shracadh as an gcré agus iad a chur le chéile arís

english: pressing sticks, lollipop sticks, feathers or buttons into the clay
irish: cipíní, cipíní líreacáin, cleití nó cnaipí a bhrú isteach sa chré

english: experimenting with surface mark-making, texture and pattern
irish: turgnamh le marcanna, le huigeacht agus le gréas a dhéanamh ar dhromchla

english: making a variety of real or imaginary animals
irish: raon d'ainmhithe nó d'ainmhithe samhailteacha éagsúla a dhéanamh

english: talking about the marks made
irish: na marcanna a rinneadh a phlé

english: turning a ball of clay into an imaginary creature
irish: créatúr samhailteach a dhéanamh de liathróid chré

english: describing the clay form
irish: cur síos ar an bhfoirm chré

english: how he/she enjoyed manipulating the clay
irish: mar a thaitin sé leis/léi an chré a láimhsiú

english: how the craftsperson may have worked with it
irish: mar a d'oibrigh an ceardaí leis an gcré, b'fhéidir

english: materials and tools used
irish: na hábhair agus na huirlisí a úsáideadh

english: what he/she likes best about the clay form
irish: an ghné den fhoirm chré is mó a thaitníonn leis/léi

english: a public building, farm buildings
irish: foirgneamh poiblí, foirgnimh fheirme

english: deciding how many pieces were used to make a table, a swing, a seesaw
irish: líon na bpíosaí a úsáideadh chun bord, luascán nó maide corrach a dhéanamh a mheas

english: doll's house, toy buildings, pop-up structures, birds' nests, model farms, simple furniture in the room, cutlery trays

english: discovering the tallest, lowest, widest, narrowest parts of the structure
irish: na codanna is airde, is leithne agus is caoile den struchtúr a fhionnachtain

english: grouping, balancing and building with small components and with construction toys that allow free play
irish: grúpáil, cothromú agus tógáil a dhéanamh le comhpháirteanna beaga agus le bréagáin thógála atá oiriúnach do shaorshúgradh

irish: an struchtúr a atheagrú

english: drawing or painting what it might be like to be in that structure
irish: mar a mhothódh bheith istigh sa struchtúr sin a léiriú trí líníocht nó trí phéinteáil

english: making a stabile to explore line and shape in a structure
irish: staibíl a dhéanamh chun líne agus cruth a iniúchadh i struchtúr

english: making an imaginative dwelling using boxes, pieces of polystyrene
irish: boscaí agus píosaí polaistiréine a úsáid chun áitreabh samhailteach a dhéanamh

english: making an imaginative play structure with large boxes balanced on each other
irish: boscaí móra a chothromú ar a chéile chun struchtúr shamhlailteacha a dhéanamh

english: making an imaginative plaything (e.g. making a space helmet or party hat using a large box)

english: painting the finished work in a limited colour range to focus on colour and pure colour (hue)

english: experimenting with ways of repeating and combining examples of one or more prints
irish: triail a bhaint as slite chun samplaí de phrionta nó phriontaí a athchóipeáil agus a chomhcheangal arís agus arís

english: from cut or torn pieces of thin polystyrene
irish: le píosaí gearrtha nó stróicthe de pholaistiréin tanaí

english: from his/her own marks made in the clay
irish: trí a m(h)arcanna féin a dhéanamh sa chré

english: from textured items pressed into a slab of clay
irish: trí rudaí uigeacha a bhrú isteach i leac chré

english: making a variety of relief prints
irish: priontaí éagsúla rilífeacha a dhéanamh

english: masking an area of an inked surface with pieces of paper cut or torn to own design
irish: achar de dhromchla clúdaithe le dúch a mhascadh le píosaí páipéir a gearradh nó a stróiceadh de réir a d(h)earadh féin

english: printing with mask-outs
irish: priontáil trí mhascadh

english: using computer experiments in shape and colour to design a print
irish: ríomhthurgnaimh a dhéanamh le dath agus le cruth chun prionta a dhearadh

english: posters, wallpaper, fabrics with simple repeat or other design, packaging, wrapping paper
irish: póstaeir, páipéar balla, fabraicí le dearadh athchóipeálta arís agus arís eile nó le dearadh de shaghas eile, ábhar pacála, páipéar beartán

english: describing the print
irish: cur síos a dhéanamh ar an bprionta

english: how he/she enjoyed making them
irish: mar a thaitin sé leis/léi iad a dhéanamh

english: how the artist possibly made them
irish: mar a rinne an t-ealaíontóir iad

english: line, shape, texture, pattern
irish: líne, cruth, uigeacht, gréas

english: what he/she likes best about the print
irish: an ghné den phrionta is mó a thaitníonn leis/léi

english: beginning to organise the print marks purposefully
irish: tosú ar na marcanna priontála a eagrú le cuspóir cinnte

english: discovering how simple prints could be further developed (e.g. overprinting)
irish: conas priontaí simplí a fhorbairt a thuilleadh fós a iniúchadh (m.sh. forphriontáil)

english: with oddments that have interesting textures or shapes
irish: le hearraí fuíll ag a bhfuil uigeacht nó cruthanna spéisiúla

english: with one or two paint colours to help focus on texture, shape, pattern
irish: le dath amháin nó le dhá dhath chun béim a leagan ar uigeacht, ar chruth agus ar ghréas

english: experimenting with ways of repeating and combining examples of one or more prints
irish: triail a bhaint as slite chun samplaí de phrionta nó phriontaí a athchóipeáil agus a chomhcheangal arís agus arís

english: from cut or torn pieces of thin polystyrene
irish: le píosaí gearrtha nó stróicthe de pholaistiréin tanaí

english: from his/her own marks made in the clay
irish: trí a m(h)arcanna féin a dhéanamh sa chré

english: from textured items pressed into a slab of clay
irish: trí rudaí uigeacha a bhrú isteach i leac chré

english: making a variety of relief prints
irish: priontaí éagsúla rilífeacha a dhéanamh

english: masking an area of an inked surface with pieces of paper cut or torn to own design
irish: achar de dhromchla clúdaithe le dúch a mhascadh le píosaí páipéir a gearradh nó a stróiceadh de réir a d(h)earadh féin

english: printing with mask-outs
irish: priontáil trí mhascadh

english: using computer experiments in shape and colour to design a print
irish: ríomhthurgnaimh a dhéanamh le dath agus le cruth chun prionta a dhearadh

english: contribute ideas on where we should place each burrow in the warren, where the green area should be, and where we should have paths through the briars
irish: a c(h)ion féin d'idéanna a thabhairt i dtaobh cén áit ar chóir gach poll aláithriú sa choinicéar, an áit ar cheart an phlásóg a bheith, agus an áit ar cheart na cosáin trí na driseacha a bheith

english: co-operate with others, in small groups, in making a scene between puppets
irish: comhoibriú le daoine eile, i ngrúpaí beaga, agus radharc idir phuipéid á cheapadh

english: in a play about an ark, take turns making the sound of his/her animal
irish: i ndráma i dtaobh áirce, uainíocht a dhéanamh ar a chéile, ag déanamh aithrise ar ghlór a (h)ainmhí féin

english: as rescuers, help the others to decide which songs they could sing for the king or queen so that he/she will not notice the prisoner being released
irish: agus iad ina dtarrthálaithe, cuidiú le daoine eile cinneadh ar na hamhráin a d'fhéadfaidís canadh don rí nó don bhanríon ionas nach dtabharfadh sé/sí faoi deara an príosúnach á scaoileadh saor

english: contribute ideas about what has to be done if this wet night must be spent on the hillside
irish: a c(h)ion féin d'idéanna a chur i láthair i dtaobh cad ab fhearr a dhéanamh má tá an oíche bháistí seo le cur díobh ar an sliabh acu

english: help others to decide how best to find a way out of the forest
irish: cuidiú le daoine eile a shocrú conas ab fhearr bealach as an bhforaois a aimsiú

english: mar dhaoine atá ag dul go dtí an t-oileán, abair na rannta agus na hamhráin a shásóidh an bádóir
irish: mar dhaoine atá ag dul go dtí an t-oileán, abair na rainn agus na hamhráin a shásóidh an bádóir

english: concentrate, with the group, on convincing the cowardly wizard that the frog will not harm him/her
irish: i dteannta leis an ngrúpa, díriú go hiomlán ar a áiteamh ar an draoi meata nach ndéanfaidh an frog dochar ar bith dó/di

english: in a drama about a mountain rescue, concentrate on helping the whole group to follow the leader over the stepping-stones without anyone falling in
irish: i ndráma faoi tharrtháil sléibhe, díriú go hiomlán ar chuidiú leis an ngrúpa ar fad an treoraí a leanúint thar an gclochán gan duine ar bith a thitim isteach san uisce

english: together with the other children decide, by concentrating on listening to the sounds of animals in the woods, whether it is safe to leave the tent
irish: trí éisteacht go haireach le glórtha ainmhithe sa choill, a chinneadh i gcomhairle leis na páistí eile an mbeadh sé sábháilte an puball a fhágáil

english: while making get-well cards for an bhábóg bhreoite the teacher keeps the focus on bábóg by telling the children about his/her own visit to the hospital
irish: agus cártaí bisigh á ndéanamh aige don bhábóg bhreoite coinníonn an múinteoir an fócas ar an mbábóg trí insint do na páistí faoina c(h)uairt féin go dtí an t-ospidéal

english: a ‘friendly’ stranger offers sweets to him/her and to other members of the group, who decide whether or not to take them
irish: nuair a thairgeann strainséar 'cneasta' milseáin dó/di agus do chuid eile den ghrúpa cinneann an grúpa cibé a ghlacfaidh siad leo nó a mhalairt

english: if one person (represented by a coat) falls into the stream, he/she, together with the group, will have to abandon the journey
irish: má thiteann duine amháin (a seasann cóta dó) isteach sa sruthán, beidh air/uirthi agus ar an ngrúpa ar fad éirí as an turas

english: if the bear cannot go up the slippery slope, he/she will not be able to rescue the stranded penguin
irish: murar féidir leis an mbéar dreapadh in aghaidh an aird shleamhain ní bheidh sé/sí in ann an phiongain thréighthe a tharrtháil

english: adopt the role of one of the children whom the lion asks to be his friends
irish: ról duine de na páistí a n-iarrann an leon orthu a bheith ina gcairde aige a ghlacadh

english: adopt the role of the helper of the bear who wants to climb the slippery slope
irish: ról chúntóir an bhéir ar mian leis dreapadh in aghaidh an aird shleamhain a ghlacadh

english: in a drama about making a suitable village for tigers, be a person who wants, for example, a playground for baby tigers
irish: ról duine atá, mar shampla, ag iarraidh clós imeartha a chur ar fáil do choileáin tíogair a ghlacadh i ndráma i dtaobh sráidbhaile oiriúnach a thógáil do thíogair

english: take on different roles in a puppet drama
irish: rólanna difriúla i ndráma puipéad a ghlacadh

english: be one of a group of toys in the shop when the owner comes and tells them that he/she will have to sell the shop or sell one of them
irish: a chur i gcéill gur ball de bhaicle bréagán i siopa é/í nuair a thagann an siopadóir chun a rá leo go gcaithfidh sé/sí an siopa nó ceann acu féin a dhíol

english: move from dressing-up play into making dramas about the dressed-up characters
irish: tosú le gléasadh súgarthach agus dul i dtreo déanamh drámaíochta i dtaobh na gcarachtar gléasta

english: move from playing a chasing game to being tigers playing the same game, and thence into a drama about tigers that will retain the same energy as the original game
irish: dul ó bheith ag gabháil do chluiche fiaigh i dtosach go bheith mar thíogar ag gabháil don chluiche céanna agus ina dhiaidh sin dul i dtreo drámaíochta i dtaobh tíogair ach a mbeidh an fuinneamh céanna ag baint léi agus a bhain leis an gcluiche tosaigh

english: move from playing at being a rabbit in a warren to becoming one of the rabbits in the group who has to find a way of dealing with a fox who keeps interrupting their grazing
irish: dul ó chur i gcéill gur coinín aonair sa choinicéar é/í go bheith ina bhall de bhaicle coiníní a chaithfidh beart a cheapadh chun déileáil le sionnach a bhíonn de shíor ag cur isteach orthu le linn dóibh a bheith ag iníor

english: the children wanting to visit an bhábóg bhreoite in hospital have to check the visiting hours, so they look up the telephone number and ring the hospital
irish: ós rud é gur mhian leis na páistí cuairt a thabhairt ar an mbábóg bhreoite san ospidéal tá orthu na huaireanta cuartaíochta a dhearbhú agus, mar sin, breathnaíonn siad an uimhir theileafóin agus ghlaonn siad ar an ospidéal

english: the children, knowing that the elf has always been afraid of the dark and wishing him not to be afraid in the future, offer to help him to go to the wizard, who will cure him
irish: ós rud é go bhfuil a fhios ag na páistí go mbíonn eagla ar an tsióg sa dorchadas i gcónaí agus gur mian leo nach mbeidh eagla uirthi feasta, tairgíonn siad í a thabhairt go dtí an draoi, duine a leigheasfaidh í

english: the rabbits’ previous experience of the fox chasing them, together with their desire to be safe, forces them to think about what they must do
irish: cuireann an eachtra a d'éirigh do na coiníní nuair a chuaigh an sionnach sa tóir orthu, agus ina theannta sin an dúil atá acu fanacht slán, iachall orthu machnamh a dhéanamh i dtaobh an chaoi le gníomhú feasta

english: a ruler becomes a saw or a magic wand
irish: toireasc nó slaitín draíochta is ea rialóir

english: a table and chair represent a king’s or queen’s throne
irish: seasann bord agus cathaoir do ríchathaoir rí nó bhanríona

english: imagine what is happening in a certain space if chairs and objects are arranged in a certain way
irish: má dheasaítear cathaoireacha agus rudaí eile i slí áirithe féadfaidh an páiste a bhfuil ag titim amach sa spás sin a shamhlú

english: sheets of paper become stepping-stones across a stream
irish: déantar clochán thar shruthán de leathanaigh pháipéir

english: in a drama about bears going to school, consider what bears should put in their schoolbags in the morning
irish: i ndrámaíocht i dtaobh béar ag dul ar scoil, a mheá cad ba chóir do bhéir a chur ina málaí scoile ar maidin

english: reflect on appropriate behaviour when visiting people in hospital, discussing and demonstrating how we show that we care about the person who is sick
irish: léirsmaoineamh ar iompar cuí nuair a thugtar cuairt ar dhuine in ospidéal agus an dóigh lena thaispeáint gur cás linn an duine breoite a phlé agus a léiriú

english: speculate whether he/she and the other children could have persuaded the old woman to give them bread if they had been nicer to her
irish: tuairim a chaitheamh arbh fhéidir leis/léi agus leis na páistí eile a áiteamh ar an tseanbhean arán a thabhairt dóibh dá mba rud é go raibh siad níos láiche léi

english: in the drama about the tiger village, become one of the children who has to defend his/her plan when the chief tiger (the teacher in role) says that it will not serve the tigers’ purpose
irish: ról duine de na páistí a ghlacadh sa dráma faoi shráidbhaile na dtíogar, páiste a chaitheann a p(h)lean a chosaint tar éis do thaoiseach na dtíogar (an múinteoir ag imirt i ról) a fhógairt nach n-oireann an plean sin do na tíogair

english: show the lion who can’t make friends some of the strategies that the child uses in making friends
irish: cuid de na straitéisí a mbaineann an páiste leas astu chun cairdeas a dhéanamh le daoine a léiriú don leon a bhfuil ag teip air cairdeas a dhéanamh

english: tell how he/she felt when the fairy had to walk in the snow without shoes
irish: a insint mar a d'airigh sé/sí féin nuair ab éigean don tsióg siúl cosnochtaithe sa sneachta

english: tell if mother or father would do things differently from one of the characters in the drama
irish: a rá an mbeadh modh oibre eile ag Mamaí nó Daidí le hais duine de charachtair an dráma

english: contribute ideas on where we should place each burrow in the warren, where the green area should be, and where we should have paths through the briars
irish: a c(h)ion féin d'idéanna a thabhairt i dtaobh cén áit ar chóir gach poll aláithriú sa choinicéar, an áit ar cheart an phlásóg a bheith, agus an áit ar cheart na cosáin trí na driseacha a bheith

irish: comhoibriú le daoine eile, i ngrúpaí beaga, agus radharc idir phuipéid á cheapadh

english: tell if mother or father would do things differently from one of the characters in the drama
irish: a rá an mbeadh modh oibre eile ag Mamaí nó Daidí le hais duine de charachtair an dráma

english: Hickory dickory dock, the (cat) ran up the clock'
irish: 'Luascadar, luascadar, luch, rith (an cat) suas i gclog'

english: Let everyone (clap hands) with me'
irish: 'Buail do (ghlúine)'

english: Céard is ainm duit?' -- 'Pád-raig'
irish: 'Cad is ainm duit?' -- 'Pád-raig'

english: How are you?' -- 'Fine, thank you!'

english: following directions, e.g. forward, backwards, left, right
irish: treoracha a leanúint, m.sh. ar aghaidh, ar gcúl, faoi chlé, faoi dheas

irish: roinnt díobh seo a léiriú i ndath agus i dton

english: rough, smooth, bumpy, prickly, fluffy
irish: garbh, réidh, cnapánach, biorach, clúmhach

english: texture in natural and manufactured objects
irish: uigeacht in earraí nádúrtha agus in earraí saothraithe

english: flowers and other objects from the nature table
irish: bláthanna agus ábhair eile ón mbord dúlra

english: toys with imagined background detail
irish: bréagáin le sonraí cúlra samhailteacha

english: particular moments from stories, poems, songs, music
irish: ócáidí ar leith roghnaithe as scéalta, as dánta, as amhráin agus as ceol

english: what might happen next in a story
irish: cad a d'fhéadfadh tarlú sa scéal ansin

english: describing what is happening in the painting
irish: cur síos ar a bhfuil ag tarlú sa phictiúr

english: how colour was used and effects created
irish: an tslí inar úsáideadh dath agus na torthaí a cruthaíodh

english: how they are arranged in the painting
irish: an chaoi a n-eagraítear iad sa phictiúr

english: the colours and tones chosen
irish: na dathanna agus na toin a roghnaíodh

english: the lines, shapes, textures and pattern created
irish: na línte, na cruthanna, na fabraicí agus na gréasa a cruthaíodh

english: what he/she likes best about the painting
irish: an rud is mó a thaitníonn leis/léi sa phictiúr

english: what he/she or the artist was trying to express
irish: an rud a bhí ar intinn aige/aici féin nó ag an ealaíontóir a chur in iúl

english: discover colour and tone through themes chosen for their colour possibilities (e.g. a sunny or stormy sky)
irish: dath agus ton a aithint trí théamaí a roghnaítear i ngeall ar a bhféidearthachtaí datha (m.sh. spéir ghrianmhar/stoirmiúil)

english: using repeated complementary colours to add variety to his/her work
irish: dathanna comhlántacha a úsáid arís agus arís eile chun éagsúlacht bhreise a chur lena c(h)uid oibre

english: colour-and-shape games based on camouflage
irish: cluichí datha agus crutha bunaithe ar dhuaithníocht

english: features that blend with their environment and those that stand out
irish: gnéithe a dhuaithníonn ina dtimpeallacht agus iad sin nach nduaithníonn

english: paint, crayons, chalks, coloured pencils, felttipped or fibre-tipped pens
irish: péint, criáin, cailceanna, pinn luaidhe daite, pinn le bioranna feilte nó snáithín

english: print, collage, fabric and fibre
irish: prionta, colláis, fabraic agus snáithín

english: using a computer art program to experiment with colour and to create images
irish: ríomhchlár ealaíne a úsáid chun triail a bhaint as dath agus chun íomhánna a chumadh

english: creating creamy, crumbly textures
irish: uigeacht uachtair agus uigeacht chraptha a chruthú

english: interpreting a variety of these in colour and tone
irish: roinnt díobh seo a léiriú i ndath agus i dton

irish: garbh, réidh, cnapánach, biorach, clúmhach

irish: uigeacht in earraí nádúrtha agus in earraí saothraithe

irish: bréagáin le sonraí cúlra samhailteacha

irish: ócáidí ar leith roghnaithe as scéalta, as dánta, as amhráin agus as ceol

english: what might happen next in a story
irish: cad a d'fhéadfadh tarlú sa scéal ansin

english: describing the print
irish: cur síos a dhéanamh ar an bprionta

english: how materials and tools were used to create effects
irish: mar a úsáideadh ábhair agus uirlisí chun torthaí a bhaint amach

english: line, shape, colour and tone, texture, pattern and how they combine
irish: líne, cruth, dath agus ton, uigeacht, gréas agus mar a chomhcheanglaíonn siad le chéile

english: looking at some prints to investigate printmaking techniques (e.g. comparing the lithograph with his/her own wax-resist technique)
irish: roinnt priontaí a bhreathnú chun teicníochtaí priontála a imscrúdú (m.sh. liotagraf a chur i gcomparáid lena p(h)ictiúr féin ar pháipéar gréiscdhíonach)

english: what he/she likes about the print
irish: na gnéithe den phrionta a thaitníonn leis/léi

english: discovering how simple prints could be further developed by overprinting with contrasting colours and with the same or contrasting shapes
irish: a fháil amach mar a d'fhéadfaí priontaí simplí a fhorbairt a thuilleadh trí fhorphriontáil orthu le dathanna i gcodarsnacht leo agus leis na cruthanna céanna nó le cruthanna i gcodarsnacht leo

english: making rubbings from tree bark, fabrics
irish: cuimilteáin de choirt chrainn nó d'fhabraicí a dhéanamh

english: using a limited colour range to focus on texture, shape, negative shape, pattern
irish: raon teoranta de dhathanna a úsáid chun díriú ar uigeacht, ar chruth, ar chlaonchruth agus ar ghréas

english: with oddments that have interesting textures and/or shapes
irish: le hearraí fuíll a bhfuil uigeacht nó cruthanna spéisiúla orthu

english: composing a relief print block using one or more colours
irish: feidhm a bhaint as dath amháin nó as níos mó ná dath amháin agus bloc priontála rilífe á chumadh

english: creating a design for a print by drawing thick and thin lines into a slab of clay
irish: dearadh le haghaidh prionta a chruthú trí línte tiubha agus línte tanaí a tharraingt ar leac chré

english: doing a number of exploded designs using a computer art program
irish: ríomhchlár ealaíne a úsáid chun roinnt dearthaí pléasctha a dhéanamh

english: making a variety of relief prints
irish: priontaí éagsúla rilífeacha a dhéanamh

english: making stencils
irish: stionsail a dhéanamh

english: making wax-crayon
irish: priontaí inaistrithe a dhéanamh trí chriáin chéarach a úsáid

english: making wax-resist pictures
irish: priontaí inaistrithe a dhéanamh trí chriáin chéarach a úsáid

english: masking areas of an inked surface from which prints have already been taken
irish: achair de dhromchla clúdaithe le dúch, ónar tógadh priontaí cheana, a mhascadh

english: printing with mask-outs
irish: priontáil trí mhascadh

english: sponge painting over a wax crayon or candle design
irish: péinteáil le spúinse anuas ar dhearadh criáin chéarach nó coinnle

english: spray or sponge painting over stencils cut to his/her design
irish: péint a spré nó a leathadh le spúinse ar stionsail a gearradh de réir gréasa a chum an páiste féin

english: transfer prints using wax crayons of various colours to print out as a coloured drawing
irish: criáin chéarach ar dhathanna éagsúla a úsáid chun bloc priontála daite a dhéanamh

irish: criáin chéarach ar dhathanna éagsúla a úsáid chun bloc priontála daite a dhéanamh

english: as a donkey, try, through physical and vocal communication, to make known to your masters how you feel about being pushed up a rocky mountainside
irish: i ról mar asal, iarracht a dhéanamh trí mheán cumarsáide fisiceacha agus gutha a chur in iúl do do mháistrí mar is gráin leat do thiomáint suas in aghaidh leitreach carraigí

english: as a peasant woman, try to sell your produce in a market-place full of robbers and tricksters
irish: i ról mar bhean tuaithe, bheith ag iarraidh do chuid earraí a dhíol i log margaidh atá lán le robálaithe agus bithiúnaigh

english: as a shepherd, try to get your scattered sheep into the pen without becoming too cross with them
irish: i ról mar aoire, déan iarracht a dhéanamh do chuid caorach scaipthe a bhailiú isteach sa loca gan éirí ró-chrosta leo

english: as one of a group of starving refugees, try to communicate your anger at those who are preventing you from entering the wheatfield
irish: i ról mar bhall de ghrúpa teifeach atá stiúgtha leis an ocras, iarracht a dhéanamh do chuid feirge a chur in iúl dóibh siúd atá ag cur baic ort dul isteach sa ghort cruithneachta

english: as members of a picnicking group, make suggestions about how the group should go about finding out, without arousing suspicion, who owns the clothes and belongings that have been found
irish: i ról mar dhuine de ghrúpa ar phicnic, moltaí a dhéanamh i dtaobh cé mar ba chóir don ghrúpa dul i mbun fiosraithe, gan amhras a tharraingt orthu féin, d'fhonn a fháil amach cé leis na héadaí agus na giuirléidí a fritheadh

english: decide from an old map which direction we should go in search of the treasure
irish: a chinneadh, tar éis dul i muinín seanléarscáile, cé acu treo ba cheart a ghabháil chun teacht ar an gciste

english: discuss and decide whether we should take the road that leads high into the mountains or the one that leads down to the water
irish: a phlé agus a chinneadh ar cheart bóthar na sléibhte nó an bóthar síos i dtreo an uisce a ghabháil

english: help set up an obstacle course in which the different elements represent the various hardships the shepherds might have encountered in going to Bethlehem
irish: bac-chúrsa a leagan amach, áit a seasann na heilimintí difriúla do na deacrachtaí éagsúla a d'fhulaing na haoirí ar a mbealach go Beithil

english: in a drama about space travel, decide whether we should stop to research what Mars might be like in reality before moving on with the drama
irish: i ndráma faoi spásthaisteal, a chinneadh ar cheart dúinn stopadh agus Mars athaighde, féachaint cén saghas é i ndáiríre, roimh leanúint leis an drámaíocht

english: listen and contribute when the teacher asks for help in recalling and recording key moments in the journey of the Ark before the animals reach the new world
irish: éisteacht agus cúnamh a thabhairt nuair a lorgaíonn an múinteoir cabhair chunócáidí tábhachtacha in aistear na hÁirce sular shroich siad an domhan nua amheabhrú agus a chlárú

english: as part of a drama on an encounter with a giant, show how you think the huge key should be lifted up to the lock so as to open the door
irish: mar chuid de dhráma i dtaobh teagmhála le fathach, léirigh mar ba chóir, dar leat, an eochair ollmhór a ardú go dtí an glas chun an doras a oscailt

english: in a randomly selected group of three, show for the class the scene in which the donkey is helped up the rocky slope
irish: mar dhuine de thriúr a roghnaíodh go fánach, léirigh don rang an radharc ina dtugtar lámh chúnta don asal dul suas an leitir charraigeach

english: in a randomly selected pair, show how you might convince your mother to let you go to the woods
irish: mar dhuine de bheirt a roghnaíodh go fánach, léirigh mar a d'áiteofá ar do mháthair ligean duit dul isteach sa choill

english: céard a tharlaíonn nuair a chasann an garda a labhraíonn Gaeilge ar na páistí agus iad tar éis an chathaoir a thógáil amach as an teach
irish: cad a tharlaíonn nuair a chasann an garda a labhraíonn Gaeilge ar na páistí agus iad tar éis an chathaoir a thógáil as an teach

english: decide with the group whether to give a man directions to the church and what he wants to do there
irish: a chinneadh i dteannta leis an ngrúpa an dtabharfar eolas an bhealaigh go dtí an séipéal d'fhear áirithe agus an gnó atá aige ann a thomhas

english: in a drama about friendship and exclusion, see how the group behaves when somebody new joins them
irish: i ndráma i dtaobh cairdis agus eisiatacht, suntas a thabhairt don chaoi a n-iompraíonn baill an ghrúpa iad féin nuair a thaobhaíonn duine a gcomhluadar den chéad uair

english: in the same drama, decide whether to tell the garda that we gave him directions to the church
irish: sa dráma céanna, a chinneadh an inseofar don gharda gur tugadh eolas an bhealaigh don fhear áirithe úd

english: focus on helping to solve the mathematical problems the gatekeeper sets
irish: díriú go hiomlán ar chabhrú chun na fadhbanna matamaitice a cheapann garda an gheata a réiteach

english: how can we help the peacock who has lost the ability to spread his tail?
irish: conas is féidir linn cabhrú leis an bpéacóg a chaill an cumas a heireaball a leathadh

english: mar bhall den ghrúpa atá ag iarraidh an mhuc dhraíochta a fháil ón bhfeirm, ceistigh an bhean a bhfuil mioneolas aici ar obair na feirme
irish: i ról mar bhall den ghrúpa atá ag iarraidh an mhuc dhraíochta a fháil ón bhfeirm, ceistigh an bhean a bhfuil mioneolas aici ar obair na feirme

english: the capital letters and small letters are arguing with each other but have to bury their differences when they hear there is a computer coming who wants to make them his/her slaves
irish: tá na ceannlitreacha agus na mionlitreacha ag argóint lena chéile, ach caitheann siad a n-ábhar spairne a chur uathu nuair a chloiseann siad go bhfuil ríomhaire ag teacht ar mhian leis sclábhaithe dá cuid a dhéanamh díobh

english: a scarf round the neck is taken as the royal robe, which passes from the king or queen to the pauper when they want to exchange places for the day
irish: glactar le scaif timpeall an mhuinéil mar fhalaing ríoga a ghluaiseann ón rí nó ón mbanríon go dtí an bochtán nuair is mian leo siúd a staid sa saol a mhalartú ar feadh lae

english: set out different objects to represent aspects of the room in which the camogie or football team meets
irish: nithe éagsúla a dheasú chun gnéithe de sheomra ina dtagann baill foirne camógaíochta nó peile le chéile a chur in iúl

english: use various objects to signal the different individual compartments in the rabbit warren
irish: úsáid a bhaint as rudaí éagsúla chun na réimsí difriúla i gcoinicéar a chur in iúl

english: because the shepherds and their wives have been warned that innkeepers are likely to exploit them, they treat this innkeeper warily
irish: toisc gur tugadh rabhadh do na haoirí agus dá mná céile gur dócha gur caimiléirí iad na hóstóirí, caitheann siad go faichilleach leis an óstóir áirithe seo

english: the animals, knowing that some of the wilder animals have eaten smaller animals, go to Noah to ask him to devise the ‘Rules of the Ark’
irish: agus a fhios ag na hainmhithe go bhfuil roinnt de na hainmhithe ab fhiáine tar éis ainmhithe beaga a ithe, téann siad chuig Naoi agus iarrann siad air 'Rialacha na hÁirce' a leagan síos

english: the knowledge that the princess has been imprisoned in the castle and the children’s desire to get her out make them negotiate with the gatekeeper
irish: toisc go bhfuil a fhios ag na páistí go bhfuil an bhanphrionsa i ngéibheann sa chaisleán agus fonn a bheith orthu í a shaoradh, tá iachall orthu dul chun margaíochta le garda an gheata

english: in an alternative working of the same story, play out the scene where Jenny meets the giant’s wife for the first time and the giant’s wife tells her about how hard the giant is to live with
irish: i leagan eile den scéal céanna, an radharc a léiriú ina gcastar Jenny ar bhean chéile an fhathaigh den chéad uair agus ina n-insíonn an bhean di cad é mar chiapadh é maireachtáil leis an bhfathach

english: increase audibility and volume when talking to the man at the toll bridge who is hard of hearing
irish: inchloisteacht agus láine gutha a mhéadú nuair a bhítear ag caint leis an bhfear ag an droichead dleachta atá bodhar

english: play out the scene where a dealer convinces Jack that he should sell the cow he loves for a bag of beans, exploring what kind of person the dealer is and what kind of person Jack is
irish: an radharc ina gcuireann an mangaire ina luí ar Sheán gur ceart dó a pheata bó a dhíol ar mhála pónairí a léiriú agus an sórt daoine iad an mangaire agus Seán a iniúchadh

english: take a role in a ‘presentation’ for people from China who want to see what life is like here in Ireland
irish: páirt a ghlacadh i 'léiriú' do dhaoine ón tSín, daoine ar mhian leo eolas a chur ar an gcineál saoil atá ag daoine in Éirinn

english: create circus acts for the circus owner who has lost his/her circus acts, and which must be good enough to fool the cross king or queen
irish: cleasa sorcais a cheapadh do mháistir sorcais a chaill a c(h)uid cleas féin agus iad a bheith sách maith chun dallamullóg a chur ar rí nó ar bhanríon mhallaithe

english: moving from a game with blindfolds into a drama about children who were struck blind by the wicked witch
irish: ról duine atá, mar shampla, ag iarraidh clós imeartha a chur ar fáil do choileáin tíogair a ghlacadh i ndráma i dtaobh sráidbhaile oiriúnach a thógáil do thíogair

english: react as one of a group of snowmen or snowwomen playing, singing and dancing while people are asleep, and who is told by Jack Frost that the sun will soon be here
irish: gníomhú mar a dhéanfadh duine ar ghrúpa fear nó ban sneachta atá ag súgradh, ag canadh agus ag damhsa fad atá daoine ina gcodladh nuair a insíonn Seáinín Seaca dóibh nach fada go dtiocfaidh an ghrian

english: examine the question of bullying through a reworking of ‘Jack and the Beanstalk’ or ‘Jenny and the Giant’s Wife’
irish: ceist na bulaíochta a scrúdú trí mheán leagan leasaithe de ‘Seán agus an Gas Pónaire’ nó ‘Jenny agus Bean Chéile an Fhathaigh’ a cheapadh

english: use reflections on stories gathered from his/her grandparents to lead to a drama about buying a house
irish: feidhm a bhaint as smaointe bunaithe ar scéalta a bailíodh ó sheanaithreacha/sheanmháithreacha chun dráma a chruthú faoi theach a cheannach

english: without knowing sign language, think about how to communicate with a person who cannot hear or speak
irish: smaoinigh conas ab fhearr don té nach bhfuil aon eolas aige/aici ar theanga na gcomharthaí tabhairt faoi chumarsáid a dhéanamh le duine atá bodhar agus balbh

english: in the context of a drama that uses a reworked Little Red Riding-Hood story, speculate whether there is any time when it is right to talk to strangers
irish: i gcomhthéacs na drámaíochta ina n-úsáidtear leagan leasaithe de ‘An Chochaillín Dearg’, tuairimiú an ceart choíche labhairt le strainséir

english: make a picture-sequence, frieze or model to record or interpret what happened in the drama
irish: sraith pictiúr, fríos nó mionsamhail a dhéanamh chun ar tharla sa drámaíocht a thaifeadadh nó a léirmhíniú

english: reveal whether he/she suspected that it was the man posing as the lollipop person who had robbed the church
irish: a nochtú an raibh nó nach raibh amhras air/uirthi gurbh é an fear a bhí ag ligean air féin gurbh é an maor tráchta é a rinne an séipéal a robáil

english: in role, decide how to teach the frustrated frog to calm down
irish: a chinneadh, i ról, cén chaoi ab fhearr tabhairt ar an bhfrog sáinnithe guaim a choinneáil air féin

english: out of role, speculate whether the drama might be more exciting if the ball goes into the river and is taken away by it
irish: i ról, a thuairimiú an féidir go mbeadh an dráma níos spreagúla fós dá dtitfeadh an liathróid isteach san abhainn agus go scuabfaí chun bealaigh í

english: the teacher in role (as Noah) and the animals draw up a list of suggestions on how to calm the giraffe and save the Ark, after the giraffe has put his foot through the hull
irish: tar éis don sioráf a chrúb a chur tríd an gcabhail ullmhaíonn an múinteoir ina ról (mar Naoi) agus na hainmhithe liosta moltaí chun an sioráf a shuaimhniú agus chun an Áirc a shábháil

english: write a short account of what he/she thinks the animals should do if they want to avoid being caught by the hunter
irish: gearrchuntas a scríobh ag cur síos ar cad ba chóir, dar leis/léi, do na hainmhithe a dhéanamh más mian leo a chinntiú nach ngabhfadh an fiagaí iad

english: as a donkey, try, through physical and vocal communication, to make known to your masters how you feel about being pushed up a rocky mountainside
irish: i ról mar asal, iarracht a dhéanamh trí mheán cumarsáide fisiceacha agus gutha a chur in iúl do do mháistrí mar is gráin leat do thiomáint suas in aghaidh leitreach carraigí

english: as a peasant woman, try to sell your produce in a market-place full of robbers and tricksters
irish: i ról mar bhean tuaithe, bheith ag iarraidh do chuid earraí a dhíol i log margaidh atá lán le robálaithe agus bithiúnaigh

english: as a shepherd, try to get your scattered sheep into the pen without becoming too cross with them
irish: i ról mar aoire, déan iarracht a dhéanamh do chuid caorach scaipthe a bhailiú isteach sa loca gan éirí ró-chrosta leo

english: as one of a group of starving refugees, try to communicate your anger at those who are preventing you from entering the wheatfield
irish: i ról mar bhall de ghrúpa teifeach atá stiúgtha leis an ocras, iarracht a dhéanamh do chuid feirge a chur in iúl dóibh siúd atá ag cur baic ort dul isteach sa ghort cruithneachta

english: as members of a picnicking group, make suggestions about how the group should go about finding out, without arousing suspicion, who owns the clothes and belongings that have been found
irish: i ról mar dhuine de ghrúpa ar phicnic, moltaí a dhéanamh i dtaobh cé mar ba chóir don ghrúpa dul i mbun fiosraithe, gan amhras a tharraingt orthu féin, d'fhonn a fháil amach cé leis na héadaí agus na giuirléidí a fritheadh

english: decide from an old map which direction we should go in search of the treasure
irish: a chinneadh, tar éis dul i muinín seanléarscáile, cé acu treo ba cheart a ghabháil chun teacht ar an gciste

english: discuss and decide whether we should take the road that leads high into the mountains or the one that leads down to the water
irish: a phlé agus a chinneadh ar cheart bóthar na sléibhte nó an bóthar síos i dtreo an uisce a ghabháil

english: help set up an obstacle course in which the different elements represent the various hardships the shepherds might have encountered in going to Bethlehem
irish: bac-chúrsa a leagan amach, áit a seasann na heilimintí difriúla do na deacrachtaí éagsúla a d'fhulaing na haoirí ar a mbealach go Beithil

english: in a drama about space travel, decide whether we should stop to research what Mars might be like in reality before moving on with the drama
irish: i ndráma faoi spásthaisteal, a chinneadh ar cheart dúinn stopadh agus Mars athaighde, féachaint cén saghas é i ndáiríre, roimh leanúint leis an drámaíocht

english: listen and contribute when the teacher asks for help in recalling and recording key moments in the journey of the Ark before the animals reach the new world
irish: éisteacht agus cúnamh a thabhairt nuair a lorgaíonn an múinteoir cabhair chunócáidí tábhachtacha in aistear na hÁirce sular shroich siad an domhan nua amheabhrú agus a chlárú

english: as part of a drama on an encounter with a giant, show how you think the huge key should be lifted up to the lock so as to open the door
irish: mar chuid de dhráma i dtaobh teagmhála le fathach, léirigh mar ba chóir, dar leat, an eochair ollmhór a ardú go dtí an glas chun an doras a oscailt

english: in a randomly selected group of three, show for the class the scene in which the donkey is helped up the rocky slope
irish: mar dhuine de thriúr a roghnaíodh go fánach, léirigh don rang an radharc ina dtugtar lámh chúnta don asal dul suas an leitir charraigeach

english: in a randomly selected pair, show how you might convince your mother to let you go to the woods
irish: mar dhuine de bheirt a roghnaíodh go fánach, léirigh mar a d'áiteofá ar do mháthair ligean duit dul isteach sa choill

english: céard a tharlaíonn nuair a chasann an garda a labhraíonn Gaeilge ar na páistí agus iad tar éis an chathaoir a thógáil amach as an teach
irish: cad a tharlaíonn nuair a chasann an garda a labhraíonn Gaeilge ar na páistí agus iad tar éis an chathaoir a thógáil as an teach

english: decide with the group whether to give a man directions to the church and what he wants to do there
irish: a chinneadh i dteannta leis an ngrúpa an dtabharfar eolas an bhealaigh go dtí an séipéal d'fhear áirithe agus an gnó atá aige ann a thomhas

english: in a drama about friendship and exclusion, see how the group behaves when somebody new joins them
irish: i ndráma i dtaobh cairdis agus eisiatacht, suntas a thabhairt don chaoi a n-iompraíonn baill an ghrúpa iad féin nuair a thaobhaíonn duine a gcomhluadar den chéad uair

english: in the same drama, decide whether to tell the garda that we gave him directions to the church
irish: sa dráma céanna, a chinneadh an inseofar don gharda gur tugadh eolas an bhealaigh don fhear áirithe úd

english: focus on helping to solve the mathematical problems the gatekeeper sets
irish: díriú go hiomlán ar chabhrú chun na fadhbanna matamaitice a cheapann garda an gheata a réiteach

english: how can we help the peacock who has lost the ability to spread his tail?
irish: conas is féidir linn cabhrú leis an bpéacóg a chaill an cumas a heireaball a leathadh

english: mar bhall den ghrúpa atá ag iarraidh an mhuc dhraíochta a fháil ón bhfeirm, ceistigh an bhean a bhfuil mioneolas aici ar obair na feirme
irish: i ról mar bhall den ghrúpa atá ag iarraidh an mhuc dhraíochta a fháil ón bhfeirm, ceistigh an bhean a bhfuil mioneolas aici ar obair na feirme

english: the capital letters and small letters are arguing with each other but have to bury their differences when they hear there is a computer coming who wants to make them his/her slaves
irish: tá na ceannlitreacha agus na mionlitreacha ag argóint lena chéile, ach caitheann siad a n-ábhar spairne a chur uathu nuair a chloiseann siad go bhfuil ríomhaire ag teacht ar mhian leis sclábhaithe dá cuid a dhéanamh díobh

english: a scarf round the neck is taken as the royal robe, which passes from the king or queen to the pauper when they want to exchange places for the day
irish: glactar le scaif timpeall an mhuinéil mar fhalaing ríoga a ghluaiseann ón rí nó ón mbanríon go dtí an bochtán nuair is mian leo siúd a staid sa saol a mhalartú ar feadh lae

english: set out different objects to represent aspects of the room in which the camogie or football team meets
irish: nithe éagsúla a dheasú chun gnéithe de sheomra ina dtagann baill foirne camógaíochta nó peile le chéile a chur in iúl

english: use various objects to signal the different individual compartments in the rabbit warren
irish: úsáid a bhaint as rudaí éagsúla chun na réimsí difriúla i gcoinicéar a chur in iúl

english: because the shepherds and their wives have been warned that innkeepers are likely to exploit them, they treat this innkeeper warily
irish: toisc gur tugadh rabhadh do na haoirí agus dá mná céile gur dócha gur caimiléirí iad na hóstóirí, caitheann siad go faichilleach leis an óstóir áirithe seo

english: the animals, knowing that some of the wilder animals have eaten smaller animals, go to Noah to ask him to devise the ‘Rules of the Ark’
irish: agus a fhios ag na hainmhithe go bhfuil roinnt de na hainmhithe ab fhiáine tar éis ainmhithe beaga a ithe, téann siad chuig Naoi agus iarrann siad air 'Rialacha na hÁirce' a leagan síos

english: the knowledge that the princess has been imprisoned in the castle and the children’s desire to get her out make them negotiate with the gatekeeper
irish: toisc go bhfuil a fhios ag na páistí go bhfuil an bhanphrionsa i ngéibheann sa chaisleán agus fonn a bheith orthu í a shaoradh, tá iachall orthu dul chun margaíochta le garda an gheata

english: in an alternative working of the same story, play out the scene where Jenny meets the giant’s wife for the first time and the giant’s wife tells her about how hard the giant is to live with
irish: i leagan eile den scéal céanna, an radharc a léiriú ina gcastar Jenny ar bhean chéile an fhathaigh den chéad uair agus ina n-insíonn an bhean di cad é mar chiapadh é maireachtáil leis an bhfathach

english: increase audibility and volume when talking to the man at the toll bridge who is hard of hearing
irish: inchloisteacht agus láine gutha a mhéadú nuair a bhítear ag caint leis an bhfear ag an droichead dleachta atá bodhar

english: play out the scene where a dealer convinces Jack that he should sell the cow he loves for a bag of beans, exploring what kind of person the dealer is and what kind of person Jack is
irish: an radharc ina gcuireann an mangaire ina luí ar Sheán gur ceart dó a pheata bó a dhíol ar mhála pónairí a léiriú agus an sórt daoine iad an mangaire agus Seán a iniúchadh

english: take a role in a ‘presentation’ for people from China who want to see what life is like here in Ireland
irish: páirt a ghlacadh i 'léiriú' do dhaoine ón tSín, daoine ar mhian leo eolas a chur ar an gcineál saoil atá ag daoine in Éirinn

english: create circus acts for the circus owner who has lost his/her circus acts, and which must be good enough to fool the cross king or queen
irish: cleasa sorcais a cheapadh do mháistir sorcais a chaill a c(h)uid cleas féin agus iad a bheith sách maith chun dallamullóg a chur ar rí nó ar bhanríon mhallaithe

english: moving from a game with blindfolds into a drama about children who were struck blind by the wicked witch
irish: ról duine atá, mar shampla, ag iarraidh clós imeartha a chur ar fáil do choileáin tíogair a ghlacadh i ndráma i dtaobh sráidbhaile oiriúnach a thógáil do thíogair

english: react as one of a group of snowmen or snowwomen playing, singing and dancing while people are asleep, and who is told by Jack Frost that the sun will soon be here
irish: gníomhú mar a dhéanfadh duine ar ghrúpa fear nó ban sneachta atá ag súgradh, ag canadh agus ag damhsa fad atá daoine ina gcodladh nuair a insíonn Seáinín Seaca dóibh nach fada go dtiocfaidh an ghrian

english: examine the question of bullying through a reworking of ‘Jack and the Beanstalk’ or ‘Jenny and the Giant’s Wife’
irish: ceist na bulaíochta a scrúdú trí mheán leagan leasaithe de ‘Seán agus an Gas Pónaire’ nó ‘Jenny agus Bean Chéile an Fhathaigh’ a cheapadh

english: use reflections on stories gathered from his/her grandparents to lead to a drama about buying a house
irish: feidhm a bhaint as smaointe bunaithe ar scéalta a bailíodh ó sheanaithreacha/sheanmháithreacha chun dráma a chruthú faoi theach a cheannach

english: without knowing sign language, think about how to communicate with a person who cannot hear or speak
irish: smaoinigh conas ab fhearr don té nach bhfuil aon eolas aige/aici ar theanga na gcomharthaí tabhairt faoi chumarsáid a dhéanamh le duine atá bodhar agus balbh

english: in the context of a drama that uses a reworked Little Red Riding-Hood story, speculate whether there is any time when it is right to talk to strangers
irish: i gcomhthéacs na drámaíochta ina n-úsáidtear leagan leasaithe de ‘An Chochaillín Dearg’, tuairimiú an ceart choíche labhairt le strainséir

english: make a picture-sequence, frieze or model to record or interpret what happened in the drama
irish: sraith pictiúr, fríos nó mionsamhail a dhéanamh chun ar tharla sa drámaíocht a thaifeadadh nó a léirmhíniú

english: reveal whether he/she suspected that it was the man posing as the lollipop person who had robbed the church
irish: a nochtú an raibh nó nach raibh amhras air/uirthi gurbh é an fear a bhí ag ligean air féin gurbh é an maor tráchta é a rinne an séipéal a robáil

english: in role, decide how to teach the frustrated frog to calm down
irish: a chinneadh, i ról, cén chaoi ab fhearr tabhairt ar an bhfrog sáinnithe guaim a choinneáil air féin

english: out of role, speculate whether the drama might be more exciting if the ball goes into the river and is taken away by it
irish: i ról, a thuairimiú an féidir go mbeadh an dráma níos spreagúla fós dá dtitfeadh an liathróid isteach san abhainn agus go scuabfaí chun bealaigh í

english: the teacher in role (as Noah) and the animals draw up a list of suggestions on how to calm the giraffe and save the Ark, after the giraffe has put his foot through the hull
irish: tar éis don sioráf a chrúb a chur tríd an gcabhail ullmhaíonn an múinteoir ina ról (mar Naoi) agus na hainmhithe liosta moltaí chun an sioráf a shuaimhniú agus chun an Áirc a shábháil

english: write a short account of what he/she thinks the animals should do if they want to avoid being caught by the hunter
irish: gearrchuntas a scríobh ag cur síos ar cad ba chóir, dar leis/léi, do na hainmhithe a dhéanamh más mian leo a chinntiú nach ngabhfadh an fiagaí iad

english: a high fast sound, a low fast sound, then a high, fast sound again
irish: fuaim ard tapa, fuaim íseal tapa, ansin fuaim ard tapa arís

english: high/low (pitch), fast/slow (tempo), loud/soft (dynamics), long/short (rhythm), beginning, middle and end (structure)
irish: ard/íseal (tuinairde), tapa/mall (luas), glórach/bog (dinimic), fada/gearr (rithim), tús/lár/deireadh (comhdhéanamh)

english: rain ceases: shakers (played more quietly and slower)
irish: báisteach ag stopadh: croitheadóirí (á seinm níos ciúine agus níos moille)

english: rain: rattling sounds with shakers (fast)
irish: báisteach: fuaimeanna crothla le croitheadóirí (tapa)

english: sequence of events illustrated in sound
irish: sraith eachtraí á léiriú i bhfuaim

english: story of a storm:
irish: scéal stoirme:

english: sun shines: tinkling triangle sound (short, soft)
irish: taitneamh na gréine: fuaim ghliogránach ar thriantán (gearr, bog)

english: thunder: booming drum (slow, loud)
irish: toirneach: druma plimpíleach (mall, glórach)

english: wind: vocal wind sounds (long)
irish: gaoth: fuaimeanna guthacha gaoithe (fada)

english: Cá bhfuil do mhála?' -- 'Faoin mbord'
irish: 'Cá bhfuil do mhála?' -- 'Faoin mbord'

english: What did you have for your breakfast?' -- 'Toast and peanut butter!'
irish: 'Céard a bhí agat dod' bhricfeasta?' -- Tósta agus marmaláid!

irish: Inneal bainte móna, inneal bainte móna

english: rustling paper to represent leaves in the wind
irish: siosarnach páipéir chun duilleoga sa ghaoth a chur in iúl

english: double-decker, tractor, skipping-rope

english: Dublin, Cork, Tipperary, Sligo
irish: Gaillimh, Corcaigh, Tiobraid Árann, Sligeach

english: home again, home again, jiggity jig'
irish: 'home again, home again, jiggity jig'

english: home-made: shakers, metal or wooden objects, fibres, striking or shaking in a variety of ways
irish: uirlisí a rinneadh sa bhaile: croitheadóirí, rudaí adhmaid nó miotail, snáithíní, bualadh nó croitheadh ar bhealaí éagsúla

english: manufactured: triangle, tambourine, drum, jingle stick
irish: uirlisí saothraithe: triantán, tambóirín, druma, clingmhaide

english: child, adult male, adult female
irish: páiste, fir, bean

english: ambulance, alarm clock, thunder, silence
irish: otharcharr, clog aláraim, toirneach, ciúnas

english: different types of barking
irish: cineálacha éagsúla tafann

english: different types of mechanical sounds
irish: fuaimeanna meicniúla de chineálacha éagsúla

english: howling, yapping, barking, growling
irish: glamaíl, sceamhaíl, tafann, drantán

english: lawnmower, pneumatic drill
irish: lomaire faiche, druilire aeroibrithe

english: high, low and in-between sounds
irish: ard, íseal agus fuaimeanna eatarthu

english: Bolero' by Ravel
irish: 'Bolero' le Ravel

english: music gradually getting louder
irish: ceol ag éirí níos glóraí de réir a chéile

english: triangle, struck heavily to make a loud sound, struck gently to make a soft sound
irish: triantán, é a bhualadh go trom chun fuaim ghlórach a dhéanamh, go mín chun fuaim bhog a dhéanamh

english: music with a steady beat
irish: ceol le buille cothrom

english: music without a steady beat
irish: ceol gan buille cothrom

english: Theme from Harry's Game' by Clannad
irish: 'Téama as Harry's Game' le Clannad

english: Winter Bonfire' by Prokofiev
irish: 'Tine Chnámh sa Gheimhreadh' le Prokofiev

english: dance music
irish: ceol rince

english: drum beat, played quickly or slowly
irish: buille druma, é á sheinm go tapa nó go mall

english: getting faster: 'Shoe the Donkey'
irish: luas ag éirí níos tapúla: 'Shoe the Donkey'

english: slow: a short extract from Piano Concerto No. 21, second movement, by Mozart
irish: luas mall: sliocht gearr as Coinséartó Pianó Uimhir 21, an dara gluaiseacht, le Mozart

english: bodhrán, triangle
irish: bodhrán, triantán

english: excerpts from the 'Nutcracker Suite' by Tchaikovsky
irish: sleachta as 'An Cnóire' le Tchaikovsky

english: Peter and the Wolf' by Prokofiev
irish: 'Peadar agus an Mac Tíre' le Prokofiev

english: Tuby the Tuba' by G. Kleinsinger
irish: 'Tubby an Tiúba' le G. Kleinsinger

english: Riverdance' by Bill Whelan, 'Trad at Heart'
irish: 'Riverdance' le Bill Whelan, 'Trad at Heart'

english: songs from 'Oliver!' by Lionel Bart
irish: amhráin as 'Oliver!' le Lionel Bart

english: Grandad' by Flowers and Pickett
irish: 'Grandad' le Flowers and Pickett

english: Walking in the Air' (theme from 'The Snowman', by Howard Blake)

irish: pasáil de phreab as seasamh agus liathróid bheag nó liathróid mhór á húsáid

irish: ag trasnú an bhóthair le duine fásta

irish: ag aithint daoine arb é a ndualgas é/í a choimeád sábháilte

irish: grúpáil, cothromú agus tógáil a dhéanamh le hábhair éagsúla

english: how the different parts relate to the whole
irish: mar a réitíonn na codanna éagsúla leis an iomlán

english: the spaces created, the play of light on the structure
irish: na spásanna a cruthaíodh, imeartas solais ar an struchtúr

english: the various outlines and spaces created
irish: na himlínte agus na spásanna éagsúla a cruthaíodh

english: whether the structure is delicately balanced or robust and solid
irish: an bhfuil an struchtúr cothromaithe go fíneálta nó an struchtúr urrúnta teann é?

english: investigating structure and balance in contemporary architecture and sculpture, in cast-iron structures, in bridges and in nature
irish: struchtúr agus cothromaíocht in ailtireacht agus i ndealbhóireacht chomhaimseartha, i struchtúir d'iarann teilgthe, i ndroichid agus sa dúlra a imscrúdú

irish: samhail de láthair thógála a dhearadh

irish: struchtúr rilífe a dhearadh agus béim a leagan ar phlánaí, ar chruthanna, ar rithim agus ar uigeacht

english: what he/she or the artist was trying to express
irish: an rud a bhí ar intinn aige/aici féin nó ag an ealaíontóir a chur in iúl

english: exploring the spatial effects of colour and tone through themes chosen for their colour possibilities
irish: tionchair spásúlacha dhathanna agus thon a iniúchadh trí théamaí a roghnaítear i ngeall ar a bhféidearthachtaí datha

english: using colour and tone to create a background, middle ground and foreground in simple still lifes, landscapes and cityscapes
irish: dath agus ton a úsáid chun cúlionaid, lárionaid agus réamhionaid a chruthú i gcóiriúcháin shimplí neamhbheo agus i bpictiúir de thírdhreacha agus de shráiddreacha

english: playing colour-mixing games
irish: cluichí measctha dathanna a imirt

english: working out a colour scheme for a three dimensional model he/she may have made
irish: scéim dhatha a dhearadh do shamhail thríthoiseach a rinne sé/sí

english: using repetition and variation of contrasting colours and varieties of line types and textures to add variety and unity to a piece of work
irish: feidhm a bhaint as athúsáid agus athrú dathanna codarsnacha chomh maith le saghsanna éagsúla uigeachta agus línte chun aontacht agus éagsúlacht a aimsiú i saothar

english: paint, crayons, oil or chalk pastels, coloured pencils, felt-tipped pens and fibre-tipped pens
irish: péint, criáin, pastail ola nó cailce, pinn luaidhe daite agus pinn le bioranna feilte nó snáithín

english: print, small-scale collage
irish: prionta, colláis bheaga

english: using a computer art program to experiment with the effects of warm and cool colours
irish: ríomhchlár ealaíne a úsáid chun turgnaimh a dhéanamh faoi thionchair dhathanna teolaí agus dhathanna fionnuara

english: discovering texture in natural and manufactured objects
irish: uigeacht in earraí nádúrtha agus in earraí saothraithe a fhionnachtain

english: interpreting a variety of textures in colour and tone and with varied brush strokes
irish: saghsanna éagsúla uigeachta a cruthaíodh i ndath agus i dton agus le scríobanna éagsúla scuaibe a léirmhíniú

irish: ghrúpa-pictiúir ar scála mór a dhéanamh a leíríonn pearsana nó gnéithe scéalta

english: stories, poems, songs, music
irish: scéalta, dánta, amhráin, ceol

english: what might happen next in an adventure story
irish: an chéad rud eile d'fhéadfadh titim amach i scéal eachtraíochta

english: recent and vividly recalled events from own life events he/she identifies with everyday familiar locations
irish: rudaí a tharla ina s(h)aol féin le déanaí, a bhfuil cuimhne ghlé aige/aici orthu agus a raibh dlúthbhhaint aige/aici leognátháiteanna aithnidiúla

english: looking closely for subtle colour combinations in natural and manufactured objects
irish: grinndearcadh a dhéanamh chun teaglama fíneálta datha a aithint in earraí nádúrtha agus in earraí saothraithe

english: making large-scale paintings that emphasise colour, tone, texture, shape, rhythm
irish: pictiúir mhóra a dhéanamh ina leagtar béim ar dhath, ar thon, ar uigeacht, ar chruth, ar rithim

english: portraits of classmates posing for different activities
irish: portráidí de pháistí eile sa rang ag cur staidiúir orthu féin le haghaidh gníomhaíochtaí éagsúla

english: the human figure showing action
irish: an fhíor dhaonna agus aicsean á léiriú

english: comparing stencils and monoprints with his/her work
irish: stionsail agus monaiphriontaí a chur i gcomparáid lena s(h)aothar féin

english: describing the print
irish: cur síos a dhéanamh ar an bprionta

english: how materials and tools were used to create and further develop the print
irish: mar a úsáideadh ábhair agus uirlisí chun an prionta a chruthú agus a fhorbairt

english: how problems were solved
irish: mar a réitíodh fadhbanna

english: line, shape, negative shape, texture, pattern, colour used to create the image or design
irish: líne, cruth, claonchruth, uigeacht, gréas, dath a úsáideadh chun an mhacasamhail nó an dearadh a chruthú

english: looking at some prints to investigate printmaking techniques (as well as for their own sake)
irish: roinnt priontaí a bhreathnú chun teicníochtaí priontála a imscrúdú (ar a son féin chomh maith)

english: what he/she likes about the work
irish: an ghné den saothar a thaitníonn leis/léi

english: discovering how simple prints could be further developed (e.g. overlapping shapes)
irish: a fhionnachtain conas priontaí simplí a fhorbairt a thuilleadh (cruthanna ag forluí ar a chéile, mar shampla)

english: printing with a limited colour range to help focus on creating more complex images in shape, texture, pattern
irish: priontáil a dhéanamh le raon teoranta datha ionas go ndíreofaí ar mhacasamhla níos coimpléascaí a dhéanamh i gcruth, in uigeacht agus i ngréas

english: for use on wrapping paper, boxes, fabric
irish: lena n-úsáid ar pháipéar beartán, ar bhoscaí agus ar fhabraic

english: making posters for specific purposes
irish: póstaeir a dhéanamh le haghaidh ócáidí ar leith

english: organising a layout for a print design
irish: dearadh priontála a leagan amach

english: combining with other techniques
irish: comhcheangal a dhéanamh le teicníochtaí eile

english: composing relief print blocks, emphasising line, shape, negative shape, texture, pattern
irish: bloic phriontála rilífe a chumadh agus béim á cur ar líne, ar chruth, ar chlaonchruth, ar uigeacht, ar ghréas

english: creating interesting patterns and rhythms by juxtaposing stamps
irish: gréasa agus rithimí spéisiúla a chumadh trí stampaí a chur le hais a chéile

english: impressing found items into a slab of clay
irish: nithe coitianta a bhrú isteach i leac chré

english: making a variety of relief prints
irish: priontaí éagsúla rilífeacha a dhéanamh

english: making a variety of small-scale relief prints (stamp printing)
irish: raon de phriontaí rilífe éagsúla ar scála beag a dhéanamh (stampáil)

english: making monoprints emphasising line and shape
irish: béim a leagan ar líne agus ar chruth agus monaiphriontaí á ndéanamh

english: making stencils
irish: stionsail a dhéanamh

english: masking out some areas
irish: cuid de na hachair a mhascadh

english: spray or sponge painting over stencils cut to his/her design
irish: péint a spré nó a leathadh le spúinse ar stionsail a gearradh de réir gréasa a chum an páiste féin

english: comparing stencils and monoprints with his/her work
irish: stionsail agus monaiphriontaí a chur i gcomparáid lena s(h)aothar féin

english: describing the print
irish: cur síos a dhéanamh ar an bprionta

english: how materials and tools were used to create and further develop the print
irish: mar a úsáideadh ábhair agus uirlisí chun an prionta a chruthú agus a fhorbairt

english: how problems were solved
irish: mar a réitíodh fadhbanna

english: line, shape, negative shape, texture, pattern, colour used to create the image or design
irish: líne, cruth, claonchruth, uigeacht, gréas, dath a úsáideadh chun an mhacasamhail nó an dearadh a chruthú

irish: roinnt priontaí a bhreathnú chun teicníochtaí priontála a imscrúdú (ar a son féin chomh maith)

english: what he/she likes about the work
irish: an ghné den saothar a thaitníonn leis/léi

irish: a fhionnachtain conas priontaí simplí a fhorbairt a thuilleadh (cruthanna ag forluí ar a chéile, mar shampla)
